name: GLACIERS "MIRRORED THROUGH THE ANCIENTS" 12" LP
description:
GLACIERS "Mirrored Through The Ancients" (Sound of Glaciers)

*Please note this is the regular first edition of the album, limited to 400 copies on 'smoke' colored vinyl. The vinyl image is for placement only. The final colored vinyl will be different. Comes with digital download card, insert and black dust covers. Mirrored Through The Ancients is the second full length album from San Francisco's instrumental group GLACIERS, and shows a heavier, louder, more psychedelic dynamic range than their first album. There is still plenty of melody, but more distortion, riffs, effects pedals, heavy drumming and heavy rock songs, and a much lower tuning helped give birth to this LP. With Mirrored Through The Ancients, GLACIERS have evolved and expanded into their own sound. Written and recorded during most of 2012, Mirrored Through The Ancients was captured by Phil Manley (Life Coach, The Fucking Champs and Trans Am) at Lucky Cat Studios in San Francisco. Whereas their first album And The Sea Won TheBattle was influenced by the ocean with a navigational theme, Mirrored Through The Ancients is a dark album heavily influenced by life, death, nature, California, and all things heavy. This record is also the first written fully as a band. Track Listing: Last Rites First Breath Pierced By The Sun Veil Of The Phoenix Opalesque Southwest Of Heaven (34:13 Total Running Time) Hear a new song from the album: "Veil Of The Phoenix", which is streaming at the following locations: https://soundcloud.com/soundofglaciers/glaciers-veil-of-the-phoenix -

name: GLACIERS "AND THE SEA WON THE BATTLE" 12" LP REMASTERED/LIMITED COLORED VINYL
description:
GLACIERS "And The Sea Won The Battle" LP (Sound of Glaciers)

"First proper full length (after a super limited cd-r), of gorgeously blissed out post rock from this Bay Area ensemble. Lush and textured, rhythmic and hypnotic, slow burning and sprawling, epic and super rocking, these guys take that nineties sound we love so much and make it their own, the songs smolder and pulse, before exploding into dense roiling Godspeed / Mogwai style blowouts. Meandering prettiness, gives way to loping mathy minimalism, chiming guitars, simple spare drumming, looped melodies, a slow build to near metallic crush, the bass throbbing, the guitars tangled up in psychedelic squalls, the drums muscled and propulsive. The sound moody and minor key, cinematic and soundtracky, brooding and intense, heavy and emotional and harrowing. If you dig stuff like Mogwai, Aereogramme, Mono, Pelican, Grails, Explosions In The Sky, Magyar Posse, Red Sparowes, Snowblood, that Temporary Residence instrumental rock sound, that heavy post POST rock, well, Glaciers does it as good if not better than most of your favorites. Not sure how these guys slipped under our radar, since they're from right here in the Bay Area, but it's time to right that wrong, RIGHT NOW..." ~Aquarius Records, San Francisco. 6 songs. 42 minutes total. Clear & Blue Swirl Vinyl. Limited edition of 220 pressed. Also included is a digital code to download the MP3 version of the album along with a digital booklet of artwork. -

name: GLACIERS TWO ALBUM BUNDLE
description:
GLACIERS "Mirrored Through The Ancients" + "And The Sea Won The Battle" LP Bundle (Sound of Glaciers)

This bundle includes the remastered "And the Sea Won the Battle" LP on Clear & Blue Swirl Colored Vinyl (Edition of 220) and the regular version of "Mirrored Through The Ancients" LP on Clear & Black "Smoke" Colored Vinyl (Edition of 400). The vinyl image is for placement only. The final colored vinyl will be different. *The shipping costs on this bundle were priced so we can ship you the 1st LP immediately, then ship you the 2nd LP separately once available. If you'd prefer to wait and ship both together, please let us know after you order and we'll issue a refund for the difference. -

name: GLACIERS T-SHIRT: 02
description:
GLACIERS T-Shirt: 02

This is our newest t-shirt design. 2-color artwork printed with a discharge ink technique which infuses the ink into the shirt leaving a soft finish. They are printed on a slim-fitted, pre-shrunk 100% cotton black t-shirt available in Women's Medium and Large as well as Men's Small â€“ Large. XL is sold out. Sorry.

name: GLACIERS "MIRRORED THROUGH THE ANCIENTS" 12" LP LTD EDITION
description:
GLACIERS "Mirrored Through The Ancients" (Sound of Glaciers)

Very limited mail order only edition - Limited to 100 copies. Comes with a special silk screened cover that is hand numbered on red vinyl. Please note - this is a one time only pressing and will not be repressed in this color way or with this cover. The cover and vinyl images are for placement only. The final art and colored vinyl will be different. Also note that this pressing does come with a digital download card.
